Self Leadership International Provides Self Leadership and P

September 30, 2010 – Cairnhill Road, Singapore – Self Leadership International – providing world-class leadership development and executive coaching seminars, provided self leadership and personal mastery programs for various organization worldwide.

The Self leadership and Personal Mastery leadership development is a foundational leadership training program that prepared the individual to release their potential and contribute to a team or organization.

The self leadership development program has been very important since there are lots of professionals who need to be empowered to manage their own development and growth.

Self leadership “is having a developed sense of who you are, what you can do, where you are going, coupled with the ability to manage your communication, emotions and behaviour on the way to getting there,” said Andrew Bryant, Director and leadership training executive coach of Self Leadership International.
Contents of the self leadership development program consists of an introduction to self leadership, communication 101, self-awareness and self-management, emotional intelligence and emotional resilience, overcoming limiting beliefs, personal and time-effectiveness as well as setting effective goals and outcomes.

The benefits offered by this leadership training seminar include overcoming obstacles from work and personal life, establishment of meaningful goals, increase in job satisfaction and well-being, realizing one’s goals and dreams as well as achievement of personal excellence.

In order to acquire advantages offered by the self leadership and personal mastery training, call Self Leadership International’s Singapore hotline at (65) 6887 4335 or log on to http://www.selfleadership.com.sg/

About Self Leadership International

Self Leadership International is a leadership development and executive coaching provider that is headquartered in Singapore. They also extend their leadership training services Australia-wide as well as to various countries in Asia. Their corporate mission, the empowerment of organisation’s leaders and would-be leaders, is expressed through their leadership training and coaching programs. The programs have been able to resolve the ‘knowing-doing' gap, between concepts and practical results.

Self Leadership International Offers Executive Coaching Pro

September 30, 2010 – Cairnhill Road, Singapore – Self Leadership International – a Singapore based provider of various Leadership Development, Business Communication training, and Executive Coaching programs all across the globe offered executive coaching programs for corporate individuals that aim to enhance leadership skills in preparation to become leaders in the future.

The executive coaching program consisted of leadership coaching, business and career coaching as well as coaching for managers that helped countless professionals in shaping their leadership skills in preparation for future management.

In contrast with past coaching that has been conducted which had concentrated only to help fix negative behaviour of employees, today’s coaching is about developing the capabilities of high potential performers.

The training generally highlighted the top 3 reasons for engaging in an executive coaching program: 1) To develop high potentials or facilitate a transition, 2) To act as a sounding board and 3) To address weak behaviour.

By pointing these out in the leadership development training, companies were able to resolve challenges that their leaders usually face.

With the help of the executive coaching program, both leaders and underachievers have been able to boost their performance as well as sharpened their outlooks and skills.

It has also promoted responsibility and ownership to produce better results, as well as personal, team and organizational targets for win-win situations.

Self Leadership International’s executive coaching program has been conducted by highly professional coaches.

The leaders, human resources practitioners, CEO’s, and anyone who found the program to be relevant has concluded the leadership training to be empowering and encouraging.

To schedule for either in-house or on-site leadership training, please call (65) 6887 4335 or visit http://www.selfleadership.com.sg/

About Self Leadership International

Self Leadership International is a world-class provider of various leadership development programs that deals with the leadership model, teaching, learning, and development methods for anyone who is concerned with leadership development. All these topics discussed for the leadership training have benefited companies in the business world.

Self Leadership International Provides Coaching Program for

September 30, 2010 – Cairnhill Road, Singapore – Self Leadership International – provided a comprehensive leadership development program offered to company and organization senior managers, individual leaders and even top management.

Self Leadership International is one of the world’s top providers of leadership development programs that include executive coaching, business communication training and leadership development programs.

Though their corporate office is in Singapore, but, their team has been working all throughout Australia and different parts of Asia.

One of the coaching programs offered by Self Leadership International is the Mentoring for Senior Managers.

This mentoring program is part of the comprehensive leadership development program that refers to preparing a person for a position often before they are promoted or elevated into it.

The mentoring skills training offered topics regarding the ideal characteristics of a good mentor such as:

The desire to help others – Individuals who believe in doing everything as a team and thus, will pick up anyone being left behind or is dragging down the team.

Had positive experiences with a good mentor – Individuals who had positive experiences with a mentor tend to be good mentors themselves.

Good reputation for developing others – Experienced people who have a good reputation for helping others develop their skills.

Demonstrated effective managerial and mentoring skills – Individuals who have demonstrated effective coaching, counseling, facilitating and networking skills.

The mentoring skills program also included leadership training topics such as the role of the mentor in establishing a mentor and mentee relationship, listening skills, and the Do's and do not’s of the mentoring process.

All these complete to the process of the executive coaching program for senior managers in developing a successful leadership development culture for the organization.

For inquiries on executive coaching and other leadership development programs, call (65) 6887 4335 or log on to http://www.selfleadership.com.sg/

About Self Leadership International

Self Leadership International is a world-class provider of various leadership development programs that deals with the leadership model, teaching, learning, and development methods for anyone who is concerned with leadership development. All these topics discussed for the leadership training have benefited companies in the business world.

Advantages of Undergoing Self Leadership Training

According to Andrew Bryant, Director and leadership development executive coach of Self Leadership International, self-leadership is having a developed sense of who you are, what you can do, where you are going, coupled with the ability to manage your communication, emotions and behaviour on the way to getting there.

In today's environment, individuals need to be empowered to manage their own development and growth. Rather than relying on your organisation or your colleagues to make your life meaningful and effective, undergoing self-leadership training is appropriate on how you can change your life for the better.

Also, the self-leadership approach is unique that change comes from within, without the need to change organisational structures and support mechanisms. Thus, you can fulfill more of your potential by establishing your own direction and learning to overcome obstacles independently.
So to achieve these advantages, one of the leadership training companies that can help you to achieve your work and personal goals is Self leadership International (SLI). They are the lead provider of leadership development and executive coaching programs that is committed to providing leadership training among corporate individuals.

By going through self-leadership skills training, it can help you increase your effectiveness and enable you to:

=Establish meaningful goals.
=Increase your job satisfaction and well-being.
=Overcome obstacles in your work and personal life.
=Realise your goals and dreams.
=Achieve personal excellence.

Besides offering self leadership training, Self Leadership International also provides leadership development training and executive coaching programs that can empower individuals.

Plus, with the help of SLI’s leadership development services, organisations were able to realise and actualise their full potential as well as close the 'knowing-doing' gap between concepts and practical results.

To schedule for an in-house or public Self leadership mastery and other leadership training and executive coaching programs call, (65)-6887-4335 or visit http://www.selfleadership.com.sg/

Enhancing Interpersonal Skills through Business Communicatio

Enhancing Interpersonal Skills through Business Communication Seminars

In today’s competitive business world, clear and effective communication is more essential than ever before. Having good business communication skills is the basis on which companies and careers are built as well as an essential component of enduring success.

Whether the person is communicating verbally or in writing, a meaningful message means establishing a connection that leaves a powerful impression.

By undergoing a Business Communications Skills Seminar through a trusted and dependable leadership training group, people can obtain excellent business communication skills that are really winning and responsive. Moreover, a very good communication skill will lead to positive results for the individual and to the organization as well.

One of the best providers of Business Communication Seminars is Self Leadership International. They are based in Singapore but extend their leadership development and executive coaching services Australia-wide as well as to different countries in Asia.

This leadership development group has been helping professionals and institutions in developing better business communication and customer service skills.

What this leadership training group is trying to eliminate within companies is the poor exchange of communication. In this case, companies will be able to resolve conflict among its employees, gain healthy corporate relationships, boost productivity and increase profit for the institution as well.

Also, leadership training allows participants to learn and practice how to 1) understand the importance of customer service and the difference it can make to the profitability and success of the organization; 2) determine who the customers are and how to serve them effectively; 3) manage and monitor complaints; 4) telephone and face-to-face etiquette standards like what to say and how to handle customers.

Besides offering Business Communication Skills training, they also provide further leadership development, leadership training and executive coaching programs for professionals and firms that are interested in improving their corporate culture.

To learn about in-house and public communication excellence programs as well as other complete leadership development and executive coaching services, call (65)-6887-4335 or visit http://www.selfleadership.com.sg/

Important Things to Acquire in Attending a Presentation Skil

Important Things to Acquire in Attending a Presentation Skills Training

There are many professionals who still feel tense and have this natural fear in facing groups of individuals. Although they have the potential to talk or make presentations, their stage fright can lead them to perform poorly in front of others. This circumstance can be corrected if such people will go through presentation skills training.

One of the leadership training groups that can aid individuals to develop their presentation skills is Self Leadership International. They are the leading provider of wide-ranging leadership training and executive coaching programs based in Singapore.

This leadership development group offers comprehensive Business Communication Skills Seminars, with a special focus and emphasis on presentation skills.

Self Leadership International’s Presentation Skills seminar prepares participants to project confidence, poise, and clear-thinking whether in a formal stand-up or for less formal sit-down conferences.

This part of the business communication skills training can be incorporated to other leadership development , executive coaching as well as other comprehensive leadership training programs wherein presentation skills are required.

Furthermore, individuals who attend a presentation skills training will be able to learn to:

=Create effective visuals
=Speak fluently and gesture naturally
=Respond to questions
=Control nervous energy for effective presentation and communication
=Manage mind-body-emotional states for confidence and impact
=Stimulate easy interaction with an audience

By taking up the presentation skills training, people who have fears in making presentations can be helped and changed to cope with their stage fright issues as well as be able to deliver corporate presentations in a fluent, smooth and confident manner.

Self Leadership International’s presentation skills training and other leadership development programs are available for management professionals, trainers, teachers or anyone who wants to improve their self confidence and personal presentation.

To know about customized presentation skills as well as other comprehensive leadership training and executive coaching programs, contact Self Leadership International at (65)-6887-4335 or visit http://www.selfleadership.com.sg/

A Well Established Balloon Business for Sale

Currently operated from home, one of the businesses for sale from BizSellBuy prides itself on providing quality customer service. It specialises in balloon bouquets, baskets and event displays for all occasions including Valentine's Day, Mother's Day, Christmas, birthdays, baby shower parties, weddings and even corporate anniversaries.

As one of its numerous businesses for sale, it is well established, easy to run and is poised for further growth. It operates in an expanding market and can also deliver ‘A party package’ to clients who seek easy solutions to their special event or party needs.

It is situated within a growth area of South East Queensland, where demand for its products and services are set to increase as the population and target market expands in the coming years. Astute buyers will certainly reap benefits in the years to come through sustainable growth, achieved by adding further products and services as businesses for sale are positioned to do so.

Most businesses for sale also possess a growing percentage of repeat clients and have systems and procedures in place which ensure to continuously meet customer expectations.

The business products and services are always in demand even in tough economic times as people need to provide cost effective promotional and visual solutions for business and events, not to mention, daily demand of bouquets in the market.

The business has a range of equipment which are well maintained including a vehicle and a functioning website. This is a very good opportunity for those who wish to buy businesses for sale which are already positioned and established in the market.

No formal qualifications are necessary. The current owner will provide training to ensure a smooth transition for the new one. Aside from advantages mentioned above, owners will also benefit from huge growth potential by over 46% in the next 20 years.

This opportunity is unlikely to remain on the market for long so an early consideration is therefore highly recommended. For interested buyers call Julie Playforth on 0405 667382.

And for those who are interested in buying well established businesses for sale in Australia, visit BizSellBuy, the leading businesses for sale resource hub in Australia at http://www.bizsellbuy.com.au

Determine the Fair Market Value of Businesses for Sale

Anyone who has ever purchased or sold a house knows that a finance institution or bank will do valuation on the property to establish a fair market value. Sellers of property will often get a comparative market appraisal from their real estate agent to get a fair price in the market.

However, when it comes to buying businesses for sale it is not usually the case. So how will you determine the fair market value of the businesses for sale?

There are just two things you need to keep in mind.

First, you must value businesses for sale given certain assumptions and considerations. Second, you have to look at the bready band willing market value or price at which the businesses for sale could be expected to be bought and sold.

The major part of determining the total value of businesses for sale is often the goodwill and it must be capable of being transferred. Without the reasonable probability of the earnings of future maintainable profits, no present value in the form of goodwill can reasonably exist.

It has been said that “market value is that price at which the businesses for sale is most likely to change ownership at an arm’s length transaction between buyer and seller, neither under a particular compulsion to act.”

Today, as a business purchaser, do not make decisions based on emotional reasons. Calculate the value of businesses for sale based on sound profitability; the sustainability of the reported earnings and the Return on Investment (R.O.I.) which can be categorized according to the following risk:

15-25% R.O.I. for a low risk business
30-35% R.O.I. for a medium risk business
50-100% R.O.I. for a high risk business

If you are ready to buy businesses for sale, visit http://www.bizsellbuy.com.au/ for more information.

How Long Does it Take to Sell Your Business?

Normally, most businesses for sale take an average of four (4) months to sell. Some businesses for sale can even take up to one year and others never sell at all! There are three major phases in selling businesses for sale. The first is the preparation, second is the marketing to contract and the third and most important is fulfilling the terms and requirements of the contract and taking the businesses for sale contract to settlement.

To make sure that your business for sale will be sold in real time, here are the things you need to do:

Preparing businesses for sale:

>Have a current lease or sub lease in place.
>Prepare the Profit & Loss statements and tax returns of your businesses for sale .
>Prepare balance sheet and depreciation schedule.
>Obtain the independent valuation on assets.
>List all your businesses for sale equipments.
>Obtain advice on tax issues from your accountant or financial advisor.
>Off load surplus assets not needed in the business.
>Secure Business appraisal, benchmarking & KPI’s.
>Improve the transferability of the businesses for sale by having systems and procedure manual in place.
>Hold off major capital purchases prior to selling.

Marketing to Contract

>Prepare the presentation and financials of your businesses for sale.
>Produce an executive profile.
>Implement the marketing plan.
>Advertisement booked and place in press & websites.
>Initial purchases response, interview, qualify.
>E-brochure & slideshows of your businesses for sale.
>Website tracking and performance indicators.
>Networking with other business brokers.
>Prepare the buyers confidentiality agreement.
>Inspections with buyers.
>Letter of offer.
>Draft contract for buyers/sellers solicitors approval.

Contract to Settlement

>Obtain buyers details, accountant, solicitor, bank.
>Signing of the businesses for sale Contract.
>Pay deposit.
>Advise stamp duty and legal costs.
>Finance application / approval.
>Confirm lease and or franchise agreement.
>Advise staff and suppliers of changeover.
>Secure Licenses and permits of the businesses for sale.
>Safety certificate for motor vehicles and machinery.
>Insurance, work cover, ATO registration.
>Training for handover.
>Discharge deposits.
>Settlement

To make sure you are on the right track in buying businesses for sale, visit http://www.bizsellbuy.com.au/ for more information.

Buying Businesses for Sale: Top 3 Things to Consider

Buying businesses for sale is a big decision. You need to spend time investigating the business and obtain useful information to help you make a more informed decision. You must carefully asses businesses for sale especially their records and evaluate the risks. This way you will be sure to find a business that is right for you, your needs and requirements.

To help make a good start, here are the top three things you should check when buying a business for sale:

Organization and Good Standing

Find out the status of the businesses for sale. Check their minute book including the articles, amendments, registrations and resolutions. Also look for the businesses’ certificate of Good Standing. This information will help you decide whether the businesses for sale are a good deal or not.

Financial Information

Money is the blood of any businesses for sale and gaining financial information will help you weigh whether the business is profitable or not. Also, check the price sensitivity of the businesses’ products or services and how sensitive are their target market with price changes, their cost structures and fixed costs.

The Risk

Identify the businesses for sale’s competitors, complexity, variance and control. Know your competitors, where they stand in the market and how good they are. Determine if the businesses for sale is easy to manage and if it will be easy for you to get ahead of the competition. Also, check the income streams and cost structures whether they are affected by factors such as the economy and social trends.

This checklist is just to provide you with immediate ideas on how to assess businesses for sale. There are still many things you need to know. If you think that buying businesses for sale is financially healthy, then find a wide range of businesses for sale at http://www.bizsellbuy.com.au/ and discuss with their professional business brokers your future investment.
